snippet.title: WORKSHOP SIMULATOR: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Workshop Simulator is a relaxing restoration simulator - take vintage items and give them a second life - the respect for the usefulness of every object, which in the hands of a specialist can become a small work of art. 

The game's release date for Steam is March 10th 2022!

🛠 Wishlist now on Steam: http://bit.ly/Workshop_Simulator
🛠 Follow the game's fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/WorkshopSimu...

Music in background: Jinx and The Hammer - Specks 
https://jinxandthehammer.bandcamp.com...

Workshop Simulator offers players a warm and creative experience focused on the detailed and rewarding nature of tools and craft, backed by a heartwarming and nostalgic story about lessons in patience and generosity across generations. As the sun pours gently through the window and the smell of sawdust is thick in the air, players use a range of mechanics such as disassembling, cleaning, sanding, and painting to restore vintage items, or express their own creativity through brand-new creations.

- About INTERMARUM - 
INTERMARUM was founded in 2010 in the cozy and beautiful city of Opole, located in the south of Poland - the silence and peace give us the strength to do our work in a truly independent style. Since then, we created games taking the best from many genres, but at the same time making them unique with fresh ideas - we try to make our dreams a reality. Our hardened developers are working each day to deliver the best gaming experience.

-- Check our social pages -
Twitter: 
👉 https://twitter.com/intermarum
Facebook: 
👉 https://www.facebook.com/intermarum/
👉https://www.facebook.com/WorkshopSimulator
LinkedIn: 
👉https://www.linkedin.com/company/inte...

#sandboxgame #simulator #pcgame
